sentences.tran: 许多住宅都未采取足够的安全措施。
sentences.tranLocal: A large number of homes lack adequate security measures .

trans.tranLocal: a road, hill etc that is steep slopes at a high angle

sentences.tran: 路变得崎岖陡峭起来。
sentences.tranLocal: The road became rocky and steep.

sentences.tran: 到山顶的一段陡坡
sentences.tranLocal: a steep climb to the top

sentences.tran: 如果现在我向下滚动到实际的执行中，这个是可用的还是不可用的呢？
sentences.tranLocal: If I now scroll down to the actual implementation, now does this work or not work?

trans.tranLocal: to make someone or something less powerful or less important, or to become less powerful

sentences.tran: 过去两年来，总统的地位被削弱了。
sentences.tranLocal: Over the last two years the president’s position has weakened.

sentences.tran: 政策的变化削弱了工会的力量。
sentences.tranLocal: Changes in policy have weakened the power of the trade unions.

sentences.tran: 这名证人的缺席削弱了对被告的指控力度。
sentences.tranLocal: The absence of this witness has weakened the case against the accused.

虚弱地；无力地；软弱地；有病地

trans.tranLocal: to confuse someone or make them feel slightly anxious because they do not understand something

sentences.tran: 一直困扰科学家的问题
sentences.tranLocal: a question that continues to puzzle scientists

sentences.tran: 他对自己的话引起的反应感到困惑不解。
sentences.tranLocal: He was puzzled by the reactions to his remark.

sentences.tran: 令我不解的是，他的书为什么如此受欢迎。
sentences.tranLocal: What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
